root: ^The barracks were cold, and the beds were hard. This was no place to sleep.
^In the middle of the night, two prisoners started a loud and violent fight over some tobacco.
^But Arkady's sleep was deep. Nothing could wake him.
^In the morning, he discovered that someone had gone through his things while he was asleep.
^A slice of bread he had saved, a hat, and a pair of socks were missing. But most importantly, there was no trace of Andreyev's glove.
^You shouldn't leave your stuff by your bed.
^I have no idea. And besides, I ain't no snitch. Figure it out yourself.
^And how am I supposed to do that?
^Try Barracks C. They are playing Numbers today, and there is always something on the line.
^Whoever took your stuff will probably be there, trying to double his winnings.
^If you're lucky, you might even win back what was once yours.
^One more thing. Learn to keep your valuables close to you.
^Click on the door to go outside.
